info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 3:27PM MDT until June 23 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Curry County in east central New Mexico... * Until 430 PM MDT. * At 326 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cannon Air Force Base, or near Clovis, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Clovis, Texico, Cannon Air Force Base, Portair and Pleasant Hill. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 380 and 397. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
